desc: Data string to be sent through POST
title: --data

desc: Character used for splitting parameter values
title: --param-del

desc: HTTP Cookie header
title: --cookie

desc: Character used for splitting cookie values
title: --cookie-del

desc: File containing cookies in Netscape/wget format
title: --load-cookies

desc: Ignore Set-Cookie header from response
title: --drop-set-cookie

desc: HTTP User-Agent header
title: --user-agent
--random-agent
desc: Use randomly selected HTTP User-Agent header
HTTP Host header
title: --host

desc: HTTP Referer header
title: --referer

desc: Extra headers (e.g. "Accept-Language: fr\nETag: 123")
title: --headers

desc: HTTP authentication type (Basic, Digest or NTLM)
title: --auth-type

desc: HTTP authentication credentials (name:password)
title: --auth-cred

desc: HTTP authentication certificate (key_file)
title: --auth-cert-key

desc: HTTP authentication certificate (cert_file)
title: --auth-cert-cert

desc: Use a HTTP proxy to connect to the target URL
title: --proxy

desc: HTTP proxy authentication credentials (name:password)
title: --proxy-cred
--ignore-proxy
desc: Ignore system default HTTP proxy

title: --tor
desc: Use Tor anonymity network
Set Tor proxy port other than default
title: --tor-port

desc: Set Tor proxy type (HTTP (default), SOCKS4 or SOCKS5)
title: --tor-type
--check-tor
desc: Check to see if Tor is used properly
Delay in seconds between each HTTP request
title: --delay

desc: Seconds to wait before timeout connection (default 30)
title: --timeout

desc: Retries when the connection timeouts (default 3)
title: --retries

desc: Randomly change value for given parameter(s)
title: --randomize

desc: URL address to visit frequently during testing
title: --safe-url

desc: Test requests between two visits to a given safe URL
title: --safe-freq
--skip-urlencode
desc: Skip URL encoding of payload data

title: --force-ssl
desc: Force usage of SSL/HTTPS

title: --hpp
desc: Use HTTP parameter pollution
Evaluate provided Python code before the request (e.g. "import hashlib;id2=hashlib.md5(id).hexdigest()")
title: --eval
